sentences.en: Hundreds of people jammed the boardwalk to watch.
sentences.cn: 上百人挤在木板道上观看。

sentences.en: There are many places at the beach to play mini golf, go gocart riding, and to walkalong the boardwalk.
sentences.cn: 海滩上有许多地方可以打迷你高尔夫球，开卡丁车，在木板路上散步。

sentences.en: We walk on the boardwalk 3 miles each day.
sentences.cn: 我们每天在木板路上步行3里路。
